\<div id="gallery"\>\</div\>

```{css}
<style>
/* Add custom CSS styles for the gallery container and images */
#gallery {
  display: grid;
  grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fit, minmax(200px, 1fr));
  gap: 10px;
}

#gallery img {
  max-width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}
</style>
```
